title: Stranger Things
genres: Horror, Horror fiction, Thriller, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Historical drama
storyline: In 1980s Indiana, a group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits. As they search for answers, the children unravel a series of extraordinary mysteries.

title: Star Wars
storyline: As multiple star systems get involved in the Clone Wars, the Jedi Knights struggle to keep the peace and defeat the droid army of the Separatists. Meanwhile, an old threat slowly reveals its presence.

title: Harry Potter
storyline: Harry Potter series is a story about a young orphan - Harry Potter- who lives with his maternal aunt and uncle and their son(the dursleys). At the age of 11, Harry gets to know that he is a wizard (his relatives are non-magical people, muggles) and has been offered admission in Hogwarts school of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
